title: Kurosaki Mayu no Hitomi ni Utsuru Utsukushii Sekai - Novel Updates
author: Kudou Yuu   久遠 侑
description:
Is this person living?

On the day of highschool enrollment, her maturity amidst the common people had left a deep impression on me.

To possess an extraordinary presence that hardly anyone in the big city would be able to ignore, however none could think of touching that girl—- Mayu Kurosaki.

In the process of preparing for the school opening ceremony, by chances, my several chat with her served as a turning point.

Kurosaki little by little began to integrate into the entire class.

Yet just as before, inside her existed a gap, a shadow that we had yet to realize….

But I, still wished for the time that I can be at her side.>
